message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This report analyzes data from the World Bank Enterprise Surveys (WBES) and Firm Productivity surveys on the productivity of firms in low-and-middle-income economies.", "dataset": ["World Bank Enterprise Surveys (WBES)", "Firm Productivity surveys"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "Through an empirical analysis of panel data from the Living Standards Measurement Study survey, this paper finds that household debt has a nonlinear relationship with financial stress.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study survey"], "topic": ["Debt"]}, {"sentence": "Using geospatial data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service, we analyze the impact of drought on crop yields in Kenya, Tanzania, and Ethiopia.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use a newly collected dataset of administrative contract execution information to examine whether the contract mechanisms used by local governments affect the quality of public services.", "dataset": ["newly collected dataset of administrative contract execution information"], "topic": ["Governance"]}, {"sentence": "By merging the rich spatial data of OpenStreetMap with survey data from the Demographic and Health Survey (DHS), we estimate the causal relationship between water infrastructure investments and health outcomes in developing countries.", "dataset": ["OpenStreetMap", "Demographic and Health Survey (DHS)"], "topic": ["Water", "Health"]}, {"sentence": "This study uses sector-level data from the World Input-Output Database (WIOD) and the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) information technology statistics to investigate the extent of digitization across different countries and sectors.", "dataset": ["World Input-Output Database (WIOD)", "Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)"], "topic": ["Digital Development"]}, {"sentence": "Using a unique dataset with information from households and businesses, we explore how natural disasters influence firms' decisions to relocate or close down in Mexico.", "dataset": ["unique dataset with information from households and businesses"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management"]}, {"sentence": "By combining data from household surveys, school surveys, and teacher questionnaires from several low-income countries, this paper attempts to identify the factors that affect student learning outcomes in primary education.", "dataset": ["household surveys", "school surveys", "teacher questionnaires"], "topic": ["Education"]}, {"sentence": "We use a dataset of satellite images from one of Landsat's sensor systems to examine the effect of nuclear power plants on local air pollution levels in the United States.", "dataset": ["Landsat's sensor systems"], "topic": ["Energy", "Environment"]}, {"sentence": "This report draws on data from the Global Financial Inclusion Database (Global Findex) to investigate differences in financial inclusion between men and women.", "dataset": ["Global Financial Inclusion Database (Global Findex)"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Gender"]}]
